content.text1: In one of the busiest months, how do we set aside time to centre on Jesus and what his presence and life mean to us? How do we focus on what matters most?

content.text1: Living out our faith can be simple, but it's not always easy. The 30 Day Christmas Challenge is designed to help us recentre on the person of Jesus and live out his teachings in community. Are you in?

content.text1: Infinitum was founded by a small group of friends in 2015 out of a deep desire to pursue Jesus more authentically and intentionally. Leaning on the monastic examples from generations before, Infinitum became a practice and posture for discipleship in the modern world.
